mapper.select: select id AS redeemCodeId,redeemCode,ni_award_pool.awardPoolName as awardName,ni_award_pool.validBTime,ni_award_pool.validETime from ni_redeem_code,ni_award_pool where ni_redeem_code.awardPoolId=ni_award_pool.awardPoolId and ni_redeem_code.grantStatus=0 order by ni_redeem_code.id LIMIT 1
